properties.address: The Park, Newtown, Powys SY16 2NZ SY16 2NZ
properties.description: Croeso Cynnes Warm Welcome Oriel Davies is welcoming visitors to the gallery to experience and enjoy performances, workshops and community events this winter. Croeso Cynnes is a community project with wellbeing at its heart. The project aims to combat personal isolation and address the cost-of-living crisis over the winter months. Activities are free and open to young people, adults and families. Informal performances with Welsh musicians, movement artists and singers will take place on Thursday evening Lates sessions each month and during the day. Mindful workshops for adults are bookable and run over four weekly sessions, supporting wellbeing through movement and crafting. Community days will offer time to connect with others over food, conversation and nature-based creative sessions. For details about upcoming activities go to our website https://orieldavies.org/whats-on Croeso Cynness runs from January to March 2024 and follows a successful programme of activities last winter generously supported by crowd funding and the COOP UK. Croeso Cynnes 2024 is funded by the National Lottery Community Fund
properties.title: Oriel Davies Gallery

properties.description: Platform 1 at Newtown Station is a community hub with a cafe, workshop space and lounge providing hot drinks, soups and cakes. A warm space to read a book, join in conversation or join in a workshop. A wellbeing hub of creative activities for all, we are accessible and within walking distance to the town.
properties.title: Platform1
